title: [Atoll, Obsidian Pathway]
description: Dark trees continue along the inward edge of the large atoll.  The terrain shifts upward with a path leading to a grotto cresting the shoreline.  A makeshift wall is built in front of the grotto, its damp surface beaded with fresh droplets of seawater.

The dark trees continue along the inward edge of the large atoll.  The terrain shifts upward with a path leading to a grotto cresting the shoreline.  A makeshift wall is built in front of the grotto, its surface recently wet.
